text: Garanti BBVA (legal name Türkiye Garanti Bankası A.Ş.; formerly referred to as Garanti Bank in English) is a private bank founded in Ankara in 1946. It is the second largest private bank in Turkey, with consolidated assets reaching US$107 billion as of September 30, 2014. ==Ownership== The shares of the stock of Garanti Bank are traded on the Borsa Istanbul, LSE and OTCQX. The shareholding in the bank's stock is as depicted in the table below: Rank Name of owner Percentage ownership 1 Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria (BBVA) 86.00 3 Others 14.00 Total 100.00 == References ==
title: Garanti BBVA
